title: ACCOUNT LOST ISSUE
body:
Hello RIOT, it is really bad to say that you have almost zero customer service experience. 

Today, I find my account is lost, without any warning notice to my email and it was transfered by someone from NA to Turkey, and it is only the first thing RIOT did nothing for players' account security check. 

Then, when I was trying to find some help to RIOT, of course, I have to reset my password then login in to official site. Here I meet the second unbelieveable obstacle. It showed me that I still cannot log in my account in NA region with formal way. (I use the link from password reset email to come to here and type this) RIOT, do you understand if a player like me lost his or her account and got account transfered, there is almost no way to subscribe a ticket to report their troubles!!!

And after I try my greatest effort and finish my report, I got a receipt email with the language I could not understand, and I have to use google translator to help me to get understand it. 

How could there is not any single link or buttom for players who could directly contact to RIOT and report the most important problem.

replies.body:
Oof, losing an account is not a fun experience! You can easily reach out to a recovery specialist by submitting a ticket with [**this form**](http://riot.com/2iGnX0K). Be sure to select the correct language and you should be fine.

Let me know if you run into any issues submitting.
about how long will this take someone transferred my account to Brazil
I can't provide an ETA for you, since that heavily depends on a lot of factors. The best thing you can do is remain patient until a recovery specialist reaches back out to you. ^.^
